Audio.Locality: Road to Pedra do Baú, Campos do Jordão, SP
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Montane forest. Single male in small, isolated tree. After a whistled imitation. These are Calls A, B and C in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil'.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Crypturellus obsoletus,Ramphastos dicolorus,Dysithamnus xanthopterus,Cranioleuca pallida,Myiothlypis leucoblephara
